data.name: Slay the Spire - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Includes the Slay the Spire Original Soundtrack with music by Clark Aboud in MP3 format.
Songs will be placed in your Slay the Spire folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\SlayTheSpire\Soundtrack

  • Track List:
  • 01. Slay The Spire
  • 02. Exordium

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
